adTitle: No need to spend a lot to enjoy the music!

HeaderCenter.owner: This app was developed by Abdulaziz

AboutUs.des1: Ashyo - market-priced home appliances and electronics stores. For over 2 months, we have been offering a wide range of products with warranty and excellent service.
AboutUs.des2: Ashyo was founded in 2022 in Tashkent. Currently, there are 26 stores operating in the capital and regions.
AboutUs.des3: You can purchase products in any convenient way: in network stores or online. Installment plans are available for household appliances. All you need to register is your passport.
AboutUs.des4: Legal entities can purchase via bank transfer without any extra fees.
